title: The Girl Green as Elderflower
description: A novel by the 1979 Patrick White Literary Award winner. Crispin Clare has nearly died at the age of 24. Convalescing in Suffolk, he is drawn from his psychic isolation by his surroundings, his past and those around him. As a kind of therapy, he writes three strange tales of 12th-century Suffolk.
author: Randolph Stow
